entry.title: New Beginnings
entry.content: With the start of classes, it’s finally official - I’m a PhD student at IISc. Some great courses are being offered, and I’m really excited for having so much thoery packed into one semester.
entry.summary: With the start of classes, it’s finally official - I’m a PhD student at IISc. Some great courses are being offered, and I’m really excited for having so much thoery packed into one semester.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello World. This is my first post on the feed. I shall be posting updates regarding work, or any other major events here.
(Or it might turn into a microblogging platform for me, Let’s wait and watch…)
